conbody.p: Download an VM in the hypervisor format of your choice or use the latest image on Amazon EC2 or HP Public Cloud.

Host system requirements:
x86_64 processor with VT-x enabled (x86 virtualization)
3 GB+ of free memory
20 GB+ of free disk space
The VM requires at least 3 GB of RAM to run (4 GB recommended). Ensure that the host system has an amount of memory sufficient for running the operating system and any other applications you require.
